name: Real Lx Car Highway Driving
description:
The sport cars are out on the highway tracks. The simple, wide and straight racing track is like heavens for the road race car. However, there are traffic cars as well, running down the highway. You should be very careful and try not to get yourself involved in an accident in extreme speed: race highway traffic.

Features:
Smooth controls.
Different challenges.
Real in-game sounds.
Stunning locations.
Multiple challenges.
Realistic 3D graphics.
Different camera views.
